ConditionDescription: Excellent condition. Dark spots and shading is a reflection from camera.
Title: Vtg Kirks Folly LEGEND Of The HEART Charm Bracelet Necklace Knight Heart Crystal
Description: This gorgeous signed Kirks Folly charm bracelet and detachable chain to make necklace is titled "Legend of the Heart" and features a Medievel Knight theme featuring many heraldic charms.Charms include a rhinestone crown heart, fleur de lis heart, a heart with a medieval knight, a half moon with a knight’s helmet, a large heart with large 3-d knight’s helmet, a shield with an enameled iron cross, a knight helmet charm, a standing lion with dangling heart and a half moon charm with rhinestone crown. Charms feature rhinestones, crystals or pearls. The detachable necklace chain has a small star charm at each end.Approx. measurements are 28" when worn as a necklace while the bracelet measures 7 3/8" long. The largest charm measures approx. 1" tall. The weight is 108 grams so it is a heavier piece when worn as a necklace. Signed Kirks Folly on an attached hangtag.Excellent condition. Dark spots and shading is a reflection from camera.Really a gorgeous Kirks Folly charm bracelet or necklace.~Please note~Please look at the photos carefully as they are an important part of my description. Most of my pictures are taken with a magnifying lens giving me clear, close up photos. This tends to also magnify minor flaws on item which many times cannot be seen on actual item. I strive to describe all of my items as accurately and honestly as possible however as all items are pre-owned and vintage in nature, minor scratches and wear is possible. Items and colors may also look a bit different due to different monitor's colors and width. Vintage items are a piece of history and always in style. Offering styles and construction that cannot be duplicated today, buying vintage is a wonderful way to "Go Green" by recycling treasures from yesterday to brighten our today. USA Shipping Only! North Carolina Buyers are required to pay 6.75% sales tax or send me a signed exemption certificate. Powered by SixBit's eCommerce Solution
